metadata.title: CVE-2018-13300 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In FFmpeg 3.2 and 4.0.1, an improper argument (AVCodecParameters) passed tothe avpriv_request_sample function in the handle_eac3 function inlibavformat/movenc.c may trigger an out-of-array read while converting acrafted AVI file to MPEG4, leading to a denial of service and possibly aninformation disclosure.
